name: 8 Bit Pop Quiz
summary:
8 Bit Pop Quiz will show freeze frames of classic arcade games. Your job is to identify the name of the game. Use the letters provided to spell out the name. The answer area has blank spaces that will show you how many letters are in each word of the game title.
With each correct answer, you'll earn tokens. Games in the early levels will be easy to identify, but they will get more difficult as you progress. If you need help along the way, the tokens you earn can be used for helps. Helps include revealing letters in the answer or removing letters that aren't used.
